Blog.post: Ok... here's a few actors I like/think are cool =): Ashton Kutcher urlLink http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v105/_mo0nlight/baf82c60.jpg Johnny Depp urlLink http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v105/_mo0nlight/8e922f70.bmp Jacob Smith urlLink http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v105/_mo0nlight/c27987ba.jpg Kevin Clark and Joey From School Of Rock urlLink http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v105/_mo0nlight/3e3e8dfd.jpg (The images didn't work so just click on the links if you can be bothered)

I haven't been on here in ages!!! =| I need to post more... ok, new stuff: *I looked at every single Ashton Kutcher picture on the google image search *I got a C+ in an english assignment! *I didn't finish some maths thing *I probably failed some maths test *I found out kitchen's are ashtonishing... Ok er... that'll do xD

W ell, today we had photos at school, and mine was probably horrid, cos that's how I always am *gives a horrible smile* Double english wasn't too bad cos we had a substitute teacher and I didn't haev to deal with homework I haven't done which was due on tuesday... xD Well, I've actually done most of it, but haven't had a chance to print it off... I probably should have done it today at lunch instead of leaving it to tomorrow morning... but scmeh! I'm a lazy bitch, so whaddya gonna do 'bout it? Nothing? I though so *tough defeating smile* lol A bad thing about today is that I didn't get to have my guitar lesson cos My teacher was away... My friend Mel is about to start electric guitar lessons, and I'm actually really jeaous, I WANNA LEARN ELECTRIC GUITAR DAG NAB IT!!! *yells* I like yelling =) Anywayz... I could get one for christmas and start then, but since I haev an acoustic guitar, I may aswell learn on that and just get an electric when I'm like... good xD Oooh, also my friend's b*day party's this weekend, which'll rock! ;D Gotta get her a pressie yet... Dunno what I'll get her... I'll just go out n find something on friday afternoon or saturday morning... I think the paryt starts at 5pm... better check the invite xD Anywayz, guess that'll do for today xD Cya random people who aren't reading this! =D *waves*

Name : Kate Age: 13 Fave Sports: Soccer. Skateboarding. Snowboarding. Fave Colour: Green Fave Instrument: Guitar & Drums Obsessions: Jacob Smith( Cheaper by the Dozen ). Adam Brody( The OC , Grind ). Kitchen( Aka: Ashton Kutcher )'s Hair.
Well, I just made this thingo cos I felt like it... Blaaaah!
